name: TYPE()
documentation: The entity type or presention type of the current item

name: PARENT()
documentation: The parent of the current item

name: PARENT_CONTAINER()
documentation: The parent container (section, column, tab) of the current item.

name: ENTITYNAME()
documentation: If there is an associated entity, the name of it

name: ENTITYEID()
documentation: If there is an associated entity, the EID of it

name: NAME()
documentation: The name of the current item

name: ID()
documentation: The presentation ID of the current item

name: COMPONENT_PREFIX()
documentation: The component prefix of the current item

name: EID()
documentation: The EID of the current item

name: JSID()
documentation: A JavaScript safe version of the presentation ID

name: RTID()
documentation: The runtime ID of the current item

name: DEPTH()
documentation: The depth of the current item within the phase or process

name: CHILD_INDEX()
documentation: The child index of current item within its parent

name: CHECKHIDDEN()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for checking hiddens

name: DISPLAY_TEXT()
documentation: The display text for the current item

name: READONLYSTYLE()
documentation: The read-only format for the current question

name: MINVALUE()
documentation: The minimum value specified for the current question

name: DISPLAY_MINVALUE()
documentation: The formatted minimum value specified for the current question

name: MINLENGTH()
documentation: The minimum length specified for the current question

name: MAXVALUE()
documentation: The maximum value specified for the current question

name: DISPLAY_MAXVALUE()
documentation: The formatted maximum value specified for the current question

name: MAXLENGTH()
documentation: The maximum length specified for the current question

name: REGEXP()
documentation: The regular expression specified for the current question

name: LISTLENGTH()
documentation: The number of items within the list used by the current question

name: LISTPROMPT()
documentation: The list prompt to use for the current question

name: VALIDATION()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for invoking the validation on the current question

name: QLR()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for invoking any Question Level Rules on the current question

name: BBQLR()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for invoking any Question Level Rules on the current question

name: ANSWER_EC_GENERATE()
documentation: The HTML generated for the answer of the current question

name: MAND_CHR_IMG()
documentation: The mandatory character or image

name: HELP_IMG()
documentation: The help image

name: HELP_ICON_HINT()
documentation: The help icon hint text

name: GROUP_WITH_PREVIOUS()
documentation: Whether the current question is grouped with previous

name: HIDE_QUESTION_PART()
documentation: Whether the current question have the question part hidden

name: ROW_ID()
documentation: The question row id

name: LINE_ABOVE_CELL_ID()
documentation: The line above cell id

name: QUESTION_COL_ID()
documentation: The question column id

name: MANDATORY_COL_ID()
documentation: The mandatory column id

name: PREFIX_COL_ID()
documentation: The prefix column id

name: ANSWER_COL_ID()
documentation: The answer column id

name: HELP_COL_ID()
documentation: The help column id

name: LINE_BELOW_CELL_ID()
documentation: The line below cell id

name: SPACING_CELL_ID()
documentation: The cpacing cell id

name: NAVIGATION()
documentation: The JavaScript tp use for navigating

name: INPHASE()
documentation: Whether the navigation container is displayed in the current phase

name: VISITEDSTEP()
documentation: Whether the navigation item has been visited

name: CURRENTSTEP()
documentation: Whether the navigation item is the current one

name: FUTURESTEP()
documentation: Whether the navigation item is a future one

name: ONCLICK()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for the onclick() call

name: HEADING_LEVEL()
documentation: The heading level of a heading

name: DATEFORMAT()
documentation: The date format for the current question

name: IS_SPLITDATE()
documentation: Whether the date is being displayed in parts

name: DATEPARTS
documentation: The date part to use for the specified index

name: DATEPARTS[1]
documentation: The date part being used in position 1

name: DATEPARTS[2]
documentation: The date part being used in position 2

name: DATEPARTS[3]
documentation: The date part being used in position 3

name: EC_GENERATE()
documentation: The HTML that would normal be generated

name: CHILD
documentation: The child of the item, e.g. CHILD[0] to get the first child

name: IS_READONLY()
documentation: Whether the current item is read only

name: IS_HIDDEN()
documentation: Whether the current item or its parents are hidden

name: IS_ITEM_HIDDEN()
documentation: Whether the current item is hidden

name: IS_MANDATORY()
documentation: Whether the current item is mandatory

name: IS_ERROR()
documentation: Whether the current item is in error

name: IS_INFO()
documentation: Whether the current item has an info message

name: IS_WARNING()
documentation: Whether the current item has a warning message

name: ERROR_MSG()
documentation: The error message for the current item

name: INFO_MSG()
documentation: The information message for the current item

name: WARNING_MSG()
documentation: The warning message for the current item

name: IS_FIRSTCHILD()
documentation: Whether the current item is the first child

name: IS_LASTCHILD()
documentation: Whether the current item is the last child

name: NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN()
documentation: The number of children that the current item has

name: STYLES()
documentation: The style classes for the current item

name: INLINE_STYLES()
documentation: The inline styles for the current item

name: DATAGROUP()
documentation: The processed name of the data group for the current item

name: DATAITEM()
documentation: The processed name of the data item for the current item

name: NUMBER_OF_ROWS()
documentation: The number of rows to display for the current table

name: SORT_ACTION()
documentation: The JavaScript to use for sorting the current table column
